name: databox-twitter-driver
description: The Databox Docker container that provides twitter data

scripts.release: docker build -t databox-twitter-driver . && docker tag databox-twitter-driver amar.io:5000/databox-twitter-driver && docker push amar.io:5000/databox-twitter-driver

author: Yousef Amar <yousef@amar.io> (http://yousefamar.com/)
